channel.title: ScanX – Corporate Actions
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Corporate Actions

item.title: TVS Supply Chain Solutions: Additional ₹120 Crore Worth Shares Pledged to Debenture Trustee
item.description: Top News TVS Supply Chain Solutions: Additional ₹120 Crore Worth Shares Pledged to Debenture Trustee 3 hours ago TVS Supply Chain Solutions has pledged an additional 5 crore equity shares worth approximately ₹120 crores to Catalyst Trusteeship Limited as debenture trustee on December 8, 2025. Combined with an earlier pledge of 7 crore shares in April 2025, the total pledged shares now stand at 6.05 crore, representing 13.71% of the company's total share capital. The pledge serves as security for debenture holders including major financial institutions like J.P. Morgan Securities, Nomura Capital, and Kotak Private Credit Fund among others.

item.title: Sudarshan Pharma Industries Announces Postal Ballot for Independent Director Appointment
item.description: Sudarshan Pharma Industries Announces Postal Ballot for Independent Director Appointment 34 minutes ago Sudarshan Pharma Industries has issued a postal ballot notice for shareholder approval of Dr. Vijay Ojha's appointment as Independent Director. The e-voting period runs from December 15, 2025, to January 13, 2026, with results on January 14, 2026. Dr. Ojha brings 30+ years of pharmaceutical industry experience.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Close in Red, IndiGo Crisis Deepens
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Close in Red, IndiGo Crisis Deepens 20 hours ago Indian stock markets ended negative, with Nifty 50 and BSE Sensex both down 0.32%. Market breadth favored decliners, with 2,382 stocks falling versus 2,166 advancing. IndiGo's operational crisis, Biocon's biologics consolidation, ICICI Bank's stake increase in its AMC, Infosys' Vietnam expansion, and Pine Labs' AI-powered bill pay feature were key highlights. The cautious sentiment was influenced by various corporate developments and global cues.

item.title: Bondada Engineering Reports 107% Revenue Surge, Files Official BSE Update
item.description: Bondada Engineering Reports 107% Revenue Surge, Files Official BSE Update 36 minutes ago Bondada Engineering achieved exceptional 107% consolidated revenue growth as of November 2025, officially communicated through BSE filing on December 11, 2025. The infrastructure company surpassed previous year's total turnover while outlining strategic commitments to enhance stakeholder value, strengthen market presence, and leverage emerging business opportunities through disciplined execution and customer-centric delivery.
